title: Write README
description: Quick start guide: what agentlog is, install, agentlog init, copy snippet, agentlog errors. Clear enough for first-time users.

title: Validate with beads-ui-svelte integration
description: Port beads-ui-svelte console bridge to use agentlog format. Validates: 1) errors.jsonl written correctly, 2) agentlog errors reads them, 3) agentlog tail streams live. Success = agent can debug webapp without browser MCP.

title: Create GitHub org and repo
description: Create github.com/agentlog org and agentlog/agentlog repo. Set up basic repo structure.

title: Fix epic dependency direction: use parent-child type
description:
Currently epic agentlog-nuz has 19 dependencies with type 'blocks' pointing FROM epic TO children. This is semantically backwards for parent-child relationships.

The correct model: each child should have a dependency pointing TO the epic with type 'parent-child'.

Fix:
1. Remove existing blocks deps from epic
2. Add parent-child deps from each child to epic:
   bd dep add <child-id> agentlog-nuz --type parent-child

This will make bd epic status work correctly and fix the beads-ui epics view.
close_reason: Fixed: converted 19 blocks deps to parent-child type. bd epic status now works correctly.

title: Create Rust snippet
description: ~20 lines of Rust that writes to .agentlog/errors.jsonl following the schema spec. Use serde_json for serialization.

title: Create Python snippet
description: ~12 lines of Python that writes to .agentlog/errors.jsonl following the schema spec. No dependencies required - just stdlib json and pathlib.

title: Implement 'prime' command
description: Output context summary for agent injection. Recent error count, top error types, actionable summary. Used by orchestration hooks to inject context.
